website_summaries.verdict: This two speed defuzzer features adjustable blade heights for different tasks. Easy to handle and efficient to use.
pros: We love the adjustable blade heights and and three variable shaving head holes
Store away safely with protective cap
Comes with a cleaning brush to help maintain your defuzzer for prolonged use
Portable and travel friendly, as it runs on two AA batteries
cons: Some users found the battery compartment hatch comes off easily when operating

customer_reviews.title: The best Amazon purchase I’ve ever made.
customer_reviews.text: This little machine is NO JOKE! My couch was gnarly and pilled and I swear it looks brand new. The difference is unreal - have attached a photo comparison of my pre and post Beautural life. Easy to use, cheap, battery powered... changed my life. See video for it’s soothing, therapudic side benefits.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It works!!! it is light and convenience, and fix some of my clothes in minutes. not going to save a world, but def save my clothes. You can see the clear difference before and after the shaving on my picture.
customer_reviews.author: starbuck

customer_reviews.title: The possibilities are endless!
customer_reviews.text: I honestly never even knew this type of device existed. I am so happy I found this and I don’t have to throw away my favorite sweater/jacket. The shaver worked great and went over zippers, seams, and even the little leather loops on it and didn’t damage a thing. This is probably my favorite amazon purchase ever! I can’t wait to get a hold of all my daughter’s onesies.
customer_reviews.author: morningfield

customer_reviews.title: JUNK--Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Received April 20, 2019. Worked great. Only used 7-8 times and it is broken. Changed batteries etc. but not working. today 6/24/19. Window is closed to return.
customer_reviews.author: Mary T

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous!
customer_reviews.text: I used this item once on a sweater for. Few minutes. I heard a very loud popping sound followed by a sizzle. It turns out the battery had exploded. Fortunately it stayed contained in the battery compartment and didn’t get on my hand. I returned it ASAP. This product is dangerous and should be recalled. Do not buy it.
customer_reviews.author: LLMS

customer_reviews.title: Not worth my time or money.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. I inserted the batteries, began to shave the very small pilling on my couch seats, and the blades stopped after 1 attempt. I pulled they very tiny piece of fuzz off the blade, tried again, with same results. For $17 I wasn’t expecting a super sturdy shaver, but this is ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Buy it! It really works!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so this is Awesome! I’ve never owned or used one of these before but have always wanted to try it. So I finally bought this one because I sell used clothes and own Lularoe which is prone to pilling. I literally got it in today and have already used it on half my closet! It works better than imagined and wish I would have bought one a long time ago. It doesn’t come with batteries but it takes 2 double A’s so no problem. If you’re looking for one of these, this is your product! I added before and after pictures of a solid white Lularoe top to show how well it works!
customer_reviews.author: Ann Wood

customer_reviews.title: Needs more pulling power
customer_reviews.text: Didn't have enough pulling power to remove big pixy lint balls
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Didn't do anything
customer_reviews.text: Used this twice, and it barely even looked like it did anything. There was no material even in the holder, so I know there is no way it actually shaved the clothing like it was supposed to. It is light weight and easy to hold, but maybe that is why it did not do much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: worked for exactly 3 minutes and died a very sad death
customer_reviews.text: I was prepared to really like this product. Had a couple of sweaters that I was really hoping would be looking, while not new, at least with no fuzzies. Got it in put in batteries, turned it on, awesome.... I worked on the bottom half of a sweater and all of a sudden the blades stopped moving and the system just stopped working. I switched out batteries thinking hey maybe I picked up some bad batteries. Nothing not even a half a turn of the blades. Returning to find a different product
customer_reviews.author: Susan Warner

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what it says it does.
customer_reviews.text: You can put me in the 5 star group. This little thing worked perfectly. I have a small sectional sofa in dark brown. It is about 15 years old but in very good shape. Except for all those little annoying pills. Before and after pictures says it all. Did the entire sofa. Tops, bottoms, sides back in about 45 minutes with battery power to spare. Very easy to use. Very easy to clean. No complaints at all. Oh, I did 4 pillows too.
customer_reviews.author: Joni

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. I read all the reviews first and they did not disappoint ! I did my whole couch last night and sweatshirts and sweaters and coats.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Wilder

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I am super upset. This worked once... with lots of work! Second time... nothing.... just threw away money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!  Worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: For the price and east of use and effectiveness I give it a 5 star. I have a blanket where there’s plenty of fuzzy balls all around. I was going to donate it because of the fuzz. This device took care of it and help me remove the fuzz off nicely. My only concern is that eventually blade would be dull and I’ll just have to spend money for a new one when that time comes.
customer_reviews.author: Lanie Love

customer_reviews.title: Picture speaks for itself! It's amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Just look at the before and after pictures! I had so many little balls of wool pilled up on my cardigan that it was just looking old and ugly. I ran this little gadget over a few times and now it's looking as good as new! The third image is one of the fabric shaver after doing two arms. It does fill up fast but you just take it out, empty it, and that's it! Easy clean up. I really should have bought one sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Christina tran

customer_reviews.title: Beautural clothes lint shaver
customer_reviews.text: So I have these knit pants- soft and comfortable, and my favorite lounge pants, but where my thighs rub, and from many washings, they get terrible pills. I feel the need to sit and pick at them all the time, so I figured there had to be something that could fix that. Found this, read some reviews, and decided to try it. It is pretty awesome. I am posting a video and a couple of pictures. I have only had it twenty minutes so I cannot speak to longevity, but for the short term, I am pretty impressed.
customer_reviews.author: S. Horton

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shaver!
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the best fabric shaver I’ve owned! I can’t believe how good it works and just how easily it removes all the little pills with ease. I was skeptical at first reading some of the other reviews but I’m so happy I decided to check it out for myself!!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Whitlock

customer_reviews.title: Not so fabulous
customer_reviews.text: Not the best choice for my nylon angora blend sweater. Per other reviews, this product better for cotton blend (e.g. furniture balls or sturdy sweaters). For my softer nylon & angora blend sweater I also purchased gleener shaver which performed MUCH better. Even with all protective grates off this motorized shaver, it retrieved maybe half the fuzz balls and only after going over the same area countless times. Not impressed for the purpose I needed. Update: seller indicates that they have changed manufacturers since my use of the product to ensure a greater quality. great! Looking forward to new purchaser reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Practical

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan. Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Product Stops working after 5 min. I was so excited for this and am very dissatisfied. I got through a small section of one sweater and it stopped. Thinking I may have clogged it I took it apart and cleaned it and then when I turned it on again it worked. I attempted to start again and got through a small 2" area and it stopped once more. I turned it off, waited 5 min and it started spinning once again. Tried a different garment and had the same result. It performed well for 5 min when the spinners stopped again. Will be looking into a refund and return
customer_reviews.author: kelly reed

customer_reviews.title: Don’t recommend it...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product because of all the great reviews about it a year ago and didn’t use it right away, until recently. Took me 45 min to do my cashmere sweater and it still left a lot of pilling on the sweater, I gave up and just ordered a different one. The one that just came in did a wonderful job and took me only 10 min on my other garment. I would’ve returned it but it’s been a year and way past the return policy. Wish I used it right away. Note: I tried it on different garments same thing and also tried changing the batteries several times.
customer_reviews.author: HopeK

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing!
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't really get anything off of the sweater. I worked on one single area for a good minute, but it didn't pick up anything. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Lee

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a couple of uses.
customer_reviews.text: The product worked okay, not great though. After 4-5 uses, it stopped working. Changed the batteries, still nothing. Wouldn’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Try a different sweater shaver
customer_reviews.text: I purchased based on reviews and because the product was an Amazon Choice. It definitely does seem to remove pills but it takes so long having to go over the area repeatedly on the highest setting with the guard pushed down so that there’s less of a buffer. It’s battery operated, so low power in shave ability. I haven’t used it to remove lint because my primary goal was shaving sweaters. I am going to return and try a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Hmlars

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I had a shaver that I bought from Target a year or two ago, but lost in a move. I have lots of sweaters that tend to pill a lot, but that was no worries with my other fabric shaver. This one was a huge disappointment. I spend almost 30 minutes trying to do 2 sweaters. In the end, I could hardly tell the difference. No thanks
customer_reviews.author: ohdanigirl

customer_reviews.title: Figured I'd give it a try
customer_reviews.text: And so, so happy that I did!! This product is amazing!! I have tons of lululemon leggings and shorts that have pilled after tons of wear and this product made them look brand new!! I just suggest trying it out on a few items to get the hang of it. Be careful and make sure to adjust the settings accordingly to the products material. I'd hate for you to snag your favorite pair of shorts/sweater. I'm so super picky and give this product an 11 out of 10.
customer_reviews.author: Myra

customer_reviews.title: A little smaller than what was pictured which is fine. Had several shirts I bought from Kohls that ...
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller than what was pictured which is fine. Had several shirts I bought from Kohls that had all pilled around the ab area. Either I take them back and pitch a fit and ask for a refund or I buy one of these fabric shavers. Worked very well! I actually put my shirt on a wooden cutting board so I could watch the OKC Thunder while working on the shirts. It did a very good job of cutting all the pills of and again making the shirts look nice again. Very good value for the price! I'm very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Mike in Tulsa

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work at all
customer_reviews.text: I'm so disappointed in this fabric shaver. I remember when fabric shavers were sold at the dollar store and even those were better than this. I get that it's adjustable and you can adjust it for a closer shave. But even then I find that this just doesn't shave the pills off. I've tried to pull the fabric taut but there was no difference. It's only when I push the fabric right up against the blade that it kind of works. For the price I paid for this I was expecting an amazing product but instead it just doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Ay

customer_reviews.title: No good for furniture
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my furniture. It didn't work at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kath

customer_reviews.title: Product motor seemed to short first time I used it.
customer_reviews.text: Product worked okay - until us stopped working during my first use of it with brand new batteries. It sounded like something shorted in the motor.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Van Vliet

customer_reviews.title: No thanks.
customer_reviews.text: This item was delivered today. I opened it up and started using it as soon as I got home and it put a rather sizeable hole in one of my favorite sweaters. Im really upset and I will not be using this product any longer.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Item can missing the back piece & doesn’t work. Tried several different batteries.
customer_reviews.author: MBrook

customer_reviews.title: Works, handle not great
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never had a fabric shaver before, but my favorite sweater was covered in ‘bobs’ or whatever you call them so I thought I’d give this a shot. It worked great! My sweater is just like brand new. The handle design is a bit rough, though. The dust collector snaps into the front of the handle, and it doesn’t stay very well. When I use it, I just hold it firmly in a way that keeps the dust collector in place. My wife’s hands are too small to do this, however, so when she uses it the dust collector keeps falling off during use. Which sucks, because everything that you just removed falls right back onto the clothing. Terrible design.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: The compartment opens all the time
customer_reviews.text: At first I liked this until it cut 2 shirts. But that isn’t why I have learned to hate this thing. The container that holds the fuzz opens up so easily. It opens all the time, many many times during when I’m defuzzing. So frustrating. I hope it is just my particular one that slides open so gently and easily because everyone else loves it. I may go back to the one I have from the 90’s.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Leavy

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 5 uses.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing. This thing broke and just stopped working after a couple uses (didn't use it on anything other than my clothes). Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nascient

customer_reviews.title: Great for removing pills from your favorite clothes or sheets.
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect device to shave off the pills that develop on some fabrics after a lot of use. It leaves the fabric looking smooth again. I used to have a similar one that I lost in a move. This one is the perfect replacement. It is easy to use, and easy to remove and discard the pills when you are finished. I've used it on sheets and on clothes. It works beautifully!
customer_reviews.author: Joni

customer_reviews.title: Addicting
customer_reviews.text: So odd, but I like using this thing. I am sure there are others out there that work, but this one is good enough. Two knocks- I need to pass over areas a lot. Also, it has cut holes in a couple things. As I type this, I realize I should probably not rate it as high. Knocking it back to a 3. I just like it because it is mindless and oddly therapeutic. Yeah, this is a bit weird.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Really gets rid of the pills
customer_reviews.text: It's a little bigger than the one I had been using so it covers more cloth at a time. I discovered awhile back that my son's socks that would get pills on them could look like new with just a little time spent on getting rid of the pills. This device works really well and I love having the choice of speeds and thickness of the material because I also have a sweater that needs help. It arrived quickly and I am getting a lot of use out of it. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: L. Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I'll likely just throw this thing in the garbage. It does not work at all and it was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Karyn Entzion

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional!!
customer_reviews.text: A few bloggers I follow said that this was a must have. Our linen headboard needing some love, so I pulled the trigger and ordered. WOW!!!!! I’m so impressed. The headboard looks brand new! The shaver collects all of the fuzz that comes off- which, I’ll assure you, is a lot! Tried it on the jersey knit cotton t-shirt I was wearing and it did great. Also did wonderful on a velvet throw pillow on the lowest setting to remove stray fibers and hair. It comes well packaged with directions in perfect English that are easy to follow, which is a huge plus.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: This little thing might be my favorite Christmas present. It works so well and has saved some clothes that I was really close to throwing away because they were pilling so bad. This removed the pills so easily and my clothes are as good as new! I do have one word of caution: make sure you use it on a flat surface and don’t go over any parts of the fabric that aren’t as flat as they can be. If you don’t do this, you risk putting small holes in your fabric. Luckily this only happened to me once before I learned my lesson. This product is fabulous and I wish I would have discovered it sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Berkeley C

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 24 hours
customer_reviews.text: I was so impressed by this product the first time I used it on my sofa. It worked great for about 24 hours - this worked so much better than my previous shaver ever did. But then it just suddenly...stopped working. It still turned on and sounded like it was working, but it was not removing any lint at all. I changed the batteries, cleaned the blades, swapped the original blades out for the replacement blades...nothing worked. So disappointing. Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for furniture
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to remove little cotton balls all over my bed hardboard that look awful. I tried to remove them manually but I was doing more damage than good so I came across this cool tool. My bed looks brand new and it was easy to use. The top picture was how it looked before using this product. The bottom is how my headboard looked after using this product. BRAND NEW! Totally recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: First of all, this thing was packed like it was being sent to the moon - best packing I've seen for a small item. Then there are moving parts. I just wanted a fabric shaver that would clean off the little pills - and this one surely did a great job. I've had fabric shavers in the past - but none ever like this one - I'm VERY PLEASED. Customer service could not be beat!
customer_reviews.author: Iris

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok, probably not the best
customer_reviews.text: I owned my last fabric shaver for several years before buying this one. My old one worked but I wanted one that worked better and more efficiently. This one is a little better but I was hoping that it would cut the shaving time shorter. It took several minutes to shave the lint off a size small, women’s athletic sweater. It’s still a little better than my old one so I decided to not return it, but I had higher hopes for it being able to do the jobs faster and better.
customer_reviews.author: Ira

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 1st use! Rattled around and then stoppe!
customer_reviews.text: Broke after 2 uses! Started making a weird rattling noise and then wouldn’t work! Tried changing batteries and nothing. Then it started again, but without lots of power and died again. Literally after 5 minutes of use. NOT very durable at all!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: C. Chang

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t really work it’s OK for tiny pils on shirts but anything of normal pil size it can’t handle. There is a cover that blocks you from getting a flush coverage that I forced off to try and get it to work. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Pink_Dragon17

customer_reviews.title: Best invention ever!
customer_reviews.text: I’m happy to report that this works great! (So far anyways, knock on wood.) My only issue is that the case that holds the lint comes off easily and frequently. But I love seeing it fill up! Even if the blades dull quickly, it made about 5 of my favorite sweaters look like new again- so it’s worth the inexpensive cost. However, I hope it lasts for some time, because it’s super handy! I will also say- it does seem to work best on true, sweater fabrics, and less well on some of the cotton blend materials.
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Does not work!
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend this product for the simple reason that it doesn’t really work. I don’t know why many gave it 4 stars but don’t waste your money. I did it over & over n could hardly see any suction happening leaving a lot behind, it wasn’t picking it up. Either it’s defective but I think it has to do with the product itself. I will have to keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: This did a nice job on a sweater that I haven't worn in ...
customer_reviews.text: This did a nice job on a sweater that I haven't worn in a couple of years because of the pilling. I almost donated it to charity but really like the sweater, so back in the closet it went. I tried a fabric shaver a couple of years ago, and it was lousy quality. Saw this shaver on Amazon and figured I'd try it. It worked well at removing the little balls of yarn. Would have given 5 stars, but felt it could be a bit more powerful. Still a great item for the price!
customer_reviews.author: lunch lady

customer_reviews.title: Save the Shaver
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so I’m a bit confused. The internet keeps talking about how removing pills from shirts is an incredibly satisfying endeavor but it varies greatly in its effectiveness, to the point where I don’t know if I’m doing something wrong.... With thick materials like couches or fleece hoodies it works great but with softer sweaters it does not work nearly as well. I’ll keep trying but so far “meh” is my review.
customer_reviews.author: FerristOfThemAll

customer_reviews.title: Nice buy
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it once but it worked great! Only bad thing is it is battery operated ONLY! I was hoping for electric, also. It may have stated that but I had my daughter reading it to me while I was doing her hair. But the little machine worked great for 2 AA batteries and I like the small handle. My last one was quite large. It lasted me 17 years so I hope this one lasts awhile also
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: It did a good job, but it broke after using it three ...
customer_reviews.text: It did a good job, but it broke after using it three times. I thought maybe the batteries died because I was using it a lot. I got new batteries and it didn't work. Put those batteries in another product, and the product turned on just fine. The machine just broke. Really disappointed, felt like I threw away some money.
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic fuzz and lint Removal!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to remove lint from a cotton jacket that I had washed serval times, so it had peeling. This took was great. I found it best if done on a flat table. In circular motion. And don't press it hard. As that leads to the fabric binding. Resulting in cutting the fabric. I personally never experienced that. But can see that there is a slight possibility. My cotton jacket with a fur liner interior took me little over an hour, to remove lint fuzzy that happens when a cotton jacket that's been washed many times over 5 years. This was and is one of my best purchases from Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Army vet

customer_reviews.title: It is small but does the job and incredibly easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This little fabric shaver is amazing for your clothes. I had lots of sweaters that looked old after couple of use but thanks to this fabric shaver, it looks brand new now. I had my reservations using this on woolen sweater, I thought it might damage the fabric but it was not a problem at all. Since the purchase, I have used this on my clothes and fabric couch. It is amazingly simple to use as well. It is small but does the job and incredibly easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Andy S.Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Dud
customer_reviews.text: Would not turn on again after using for a couple minutes. Sending it back!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needs a light touch or you’ll end up with holes!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because a sweater I wore once was covered with fuzz. The shaver worked great. Then I washed the sweater, delicate cycle with Woolite, and the sweater must have had 20 holes in it. I had to throw it away. The sweater wasn’t all that great, but I would caution anyone using this product to use with a light touch. I don’t know if I ruined the sweater or it was the shaver.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Mom

customer_reviews.title: A godsend!
customer_reviews.text: Have a black north face hoodie jacket that for whatever reason pills like crazy. With a fresh set of AA’s this thing shaved it right off. Comes with extra blades which are super simple to install when the time comes. 2 speeds, I found the slower one worked better for me. I shaved entire men’s large jacket and there was barely anything in the bin to empty. It holds a lot. And super easy to empty too. It comes with a brush to clean the blades, and has a safety feature to where it won’t turn on when the blade guard is off, which is awesome! All in all I love this thing. Worth the 15 bucks for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Great fabric shaver!!
customer_reviews.text: This shaver saved my cheap but loved entry way rug! The rug was looking terrible because of all of the fuzzies that my vacuum brushes up. I was pretty close to tossing it out. I love the colors in the rug & it is no longer being made (dang Target). So, I figured what the heck. I’ll try this fabric shaver, as you can see in the photos it got rid of all of the fuzzies! I am thrilled, with the results. One item to note, you will get the best results from the shaver if you empty it before it gets 2/3s full. I noticed when I let it fill up more than that the shaver slowed down.
customer_reviews.author: ZenTonesCB

customer_reviews.title: Handy Little Tool
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to remove pills from some of my sweaters, and I've found it's useful for so much more! So far I've used it on a few sweatshirts, a quilt, and some pillowcases, all with great results. You can also remove the guard on the head to get down to really tiny pills, as long as you're careful. My only complaint is that the ergonomic design leaves something to be desired; the waste container pops off pretty easily while in use, spilling fuzz all over. Overall, great for the price, though!
customer_reviews.author: Anna S.

customer_reviews.title: HOWTO video!!! Fabric like new!
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic and magic. It can bring your old fabric like new again. It removes everything just lightly passing the shaver over the fabric laid flat. Super easy to collect fluff and to remove it from the collector. Please check the video to see how easy it was to restore old sweaters! It has two speed so it can be used on delicate fabric and it has also a guide that keep the shaver 3 or 5 mm from the fabric. I use it also on gloves, synthetic fabric and wool, with excellent results! Really great product!
customer_reviews.author: Davide

customer_reviews.title: It works on tough lint balls
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item as a last resort to save my favorite jacket. I washed it with a towel and it came out of the washer with tons of lint balls stuck all over it. I tried tape, a lint brush, and even a metal lint brush with fine metal teeth. None of those worked. As soon as I loaded the batteries and started it up and boom, as soon as I applied it it removed those tough lint balls with ease. It took a few passes on some areas but IT WORKED!!! : ) I cant wait to use my jacket again next yr. It's too warm in Las Vegas to use it this yr.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Wish it were bigger
customer_reviews.text: It's very easy to use - you can literally see how it works since it's transparent. It's just not meant for anything big. I bought it to do my wool blanket. Yeah, I got about 1/4 done and gave up. But it DOES work and it IS very good. I think the largest item you want to do is a wool coat - between 32 - 37 inches in length. The filling container fills up quickly, or some of the wool gets stuck in the area where the razors are, but it's easy to clean out. Seriously, I just need a bigger one for my blanket and I'm golden.
customer_reviews.author: Falling2311

customer_reviews.title: Fantastical work for my exercise pants
customer_reviews.text: There are lints on the sport pants after I wash it with my other clothes for a long time. I was going to throw these pants with lints away. But my mom and I totally have 8 pants with many white lints on, it’s too expensive to throw away these pants because of the lints. After I use this lint remover, all the lints gone and the pants looks like new. My mom is very happy about it. Only one thing I don’t like is the sound is little bit loud, and it took me about 30-45 minutes to clean up one pants. It took a while, but the result is fantastic well.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Don’t throw out that hopelessly pilled cashmere!
customer_reviews.text: I have a serious addiction to cashmere joggers so I viewed these reviews with great interest. I really regret throwing away any favorites which were victims of pilling. This works great and my knits look new. I’ve seen in some reviews that this stopped on them. If this happen to you please check the blades (carefully) to see if, although you may have cleaned out your lint cartridge, you have lint bound around the blade mechanism. That’s what it was for me, then after cleaning it was ready for more garments! A keeper!
customer_reviews.author: Foralark

customer_reviews.title: NOTHING will get all the little balls off....
customer_reviews.text: However, that being said, this was safe and well made for my cashmere sweaters. Perhaps if I would have used this from the get go they would not have pilled up so much. I worked pretty hard to get them all smooth and fluffy looking again, but will use this to maintain. A cheap sweater (mine are not~they are Talbots) is miserable. PERIOD. Get a NICE sweater. Don't mix your fabrics @ poly w/ cotton. Use this little shaver as needed to maintain. Nothing is perfect~ but this is the best made and a safe design.
customer_reviews.author: Love4Boys

customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this! I use to hate when my clothes, new clothes at that would come out of the dryer with those linty balls. This has been a huge life saver. Sweater or pants i would get rid of before have lasted me longer after using this tool to freshen them up. So in the long run this is a very clever investment. There is a dial which has one end for thin pieces and one end for thicker pieces. The only issue I have with it is the dial has gotten stuck twice, an easy fix, just annoying when it happened. I would repurchase in a heart beat!
customer_reviews.author: Gavixo

customer_reviews.title: New life to your sweaters
customer_reviews.text: What a super little device! It shaves all of those nasty pills off so effectively. You can adjust the height of the blades, and it comes with replacement blades also! It is easy to take apart and clean also, so you can get all of the old colored fuzz out before you start working on your next sweater..because sometimes you may not want the remnants of your Black Cashmere sweater all over your favorite White Cashmere Caridi, y'know? Highly recommend! You will be very happy with this purchase..I certainly am!
customer_reviews.author: Jena

customer_reviews.title: do not use on thin fabric unless you want HOLES
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use on some of my poly/rayon blend tops that have gotten pilly from normal washing/wear. I used it on one of my favorite shirts and it left 3 small holes. I attributed to user error- maybe pushing to hard. I attempted on another shirt, being very light handed and it still snagged a little hole in the hood. With that being said, it also removed a lot of the pilling. Probably works better on thicker fabrics, I don't know. I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Works great. See hint.
customer_reviews.text: Great little product. Works nicely to remove balled up and twisted fabric hairs. This is basically an electric shaver for fabric. HINT: for an even closer shave, carefully pry off the outer "ring" around the shaving head so that the blades can work even better for you. I've attached a photo of a chair cleaned up. I wish I took a photo before.
customer_reviews.author: D L

customer_reviews.title: It’s iight
customer_reviews.text: Okay so let me start this off with saying that I’ve never had an actual fabric shaver before, I’ve only ever used razors and such. This shaver definitely works better than that, but still not anything amazing. I did have pretty high hopes and maybe that’s why I’m disappointed. It got allot of the bigger pills off allot of my dresses and they felt soft to the touch, but there was some stuff left behind so my clothes still didn’t look much better. But I you get what you pay for right? Maybe when this one dies I’ll buy and ever nicer one and see if that gives me the results I was hoping for :(
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Does nothing
customer_reviews.text: This product was a waste of money. It would be faster for me to pick every individual piece of pills/lint off my clothes/blankets. It will go into my closet probably never to be used again. Disappointed! Update: contacted seller and was refunded promptly! Very happy with that. Great customer service ! Three stars now vs 2
customer_reviews.author: Sammi Cottone

customer_reviews.title: 100% nope
customer_reviews.text: Before I used this I noticed the lint receptacle slid off easily, and the design concerned me, because you hold onto it when in use. I gave it a shot anyways. While using it, I had to really work my sweaters to get the balls off... it wasn’t as quick as I thought. But for the price I figured I’d give it a chance, it would just take a very long time to remove all the balls and fuzz from a sweater. Then, mid use, the lint collector receptacle slid off and lint and fuzz went everywhere. This is a nope, 100% nope.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa

customer_reviews.title: Better than singer!
customer_reviews.text: I previously had a Singer fabric shaver which was great for a few months but dulled quickly and doesn’t have replaceable blades. That’s one of my favorite features of this shaver, plus it already comes with 2 replacements! It’s a bit bigger than my old one so it’s not the best for travel but it works much better and gets very fine lint and pilling off of delicate wool and cashmere sweaters. Since you can remove the cover it can get the pilling off of my donegal speckled cashmere without taking off any of the bigger flecks of fabric. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Megs

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy It
customer_reviews.text: For the first 20 seconds, the fuzz remover worked great, but then fuzz gets stuck in different holes so I had to stop, take apart the remover, and then clean the parts tangled with the fuzz. It's difficult to clean the remover, which I had to do just about every 30 seconds. The remover also eats up batteries quickly. The product was poorly designed and I'm not sure how it has such high ratings, but I would like to return it and would not recommend it anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Betty C

customer_reviews.title: Works better than expected
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is an outstanding value. It will pay for itself in no time. Obviously, you can't postpone the inevitable (buying a new replacement for whatever you are using it on) indefinitely. But with this, you will get several more uses out of just about anything. I tried it on a cheap set of bed sheets that had terrible pilling. I won't say they are like new, but they are definitely usable. And have stayed usable after 2 more washes.
customer_reviews.author: Tom H.

customer_reviews.title: Easy Clothing upkeep
customer_reviews.text: This fabric shaver has adjustable settings (much like a vacuum) where you can get as close to the fabric as needed. I completely took the guard off to get a close shave and I haven't had any problems with tearing/ripping. The lint compartment is big so you won't need to empty it every use. My only complaint is the guard was a bit difficult to get off, and felt like it was going to break with how much force I was using, but eventually it did budge. Overall, I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Samus

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure about this product when I ordered it as the last one I ordered from a different company was not very good. However I was delighted to find this extremely easy to use without a lot of pressure and it did an amazing job. Even my ten-year-old son loves to use it and is now looking through his closet to see what clothes he can use it on. It is super comfortable to hold and use in your hand. It removes all the fuzzies really efficiently. And it's also easy to clean and store.
customer_reviews.author: AHowie

customer_reviews.title: Works well so far
customer_reviews.text: I've had several lint shavers over the years. Most did not work well and were not very reliable. I spent a lot of time reading reviews before I purchased this model. I've only had it for one day, so I can't speak about how long it will last, but so far I am a huge fan. It works great and comes with extra blades and clear instructions. I tried it on an item that was a total disaster and it worked well beyond my expectations. It is well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kasia

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: Compact and easy to use. Really does the job of removing the pilling from fine knits. Read the directions and use on a flat surface! I had no problems using it the first time and achieved great results. I used it with the guard (not ready to try it without yet!) on the high speed. I find that using it in a circular motion helps to keep the garment in position. Very pleased!!!
customer_reviews.author: Babsongs Studio

customer_reviews.title: Super fuzz remover..
customer_reviews.text: After 12 years i had to retire my Fuzz pill remover. Hopped on amazon and found this guy. I wear alot of lularoe. So i needed it to work well but be delicate as well. Got it in the mail and loved it. Used it on Lularoe leggings and a few dresses. Made them look new and refreshed. Put it to the ultimate test on my old but favorite pillow case. It was covered in piling. It worked awesome. Making my pillow case looking new and super soft. Im very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Bubblepatch

customer_reviews.title: Great little gadget!
customer_reviews.text: Just popped it open this morning, the video you see is my "mattress in a box“ (also awesome) from the local discount store. I got it several months ago and when I took off the mattress cover that I was using, I found the little bobbles all over it. So I bought this on a whim and as you can see in the video it works great. This is my first time using it so I can't speak to its longevity but I'm happy so far. Popped two AA batteries in it and VOILA!
customer_reviews.author: A. Rogue

customer_reviews.title: just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I read many of the reviews for this product and decided it had enough positive ones to try it - I am very pleased. It is just the right size for my hand so it is easily held. And it removes the fuzz and pilling from my garments easily and with little effort. As some reviewers pointed out, I had to pass the head of the product over the area a few times, but it did remove almost if not all of the pilling - I am using it on cotton knit garments right now. I have not used it long enough to note the battery life; but based on my use up to this point, I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Yandow

customer_reviews.title: It Definitely gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: All I can really say is once you try this you will be disappointed that you hadn’t punched this sooner! I strongly recommend you get this if you or your kids purchase clothing items from Old Navy, H&M, Gap, etc. There have been quite a few sweaters we have tossed out because of the pill ball effect after a few wash and wears. You will be so glad that you can keep wearing your favorite sweaters or jackets because they don’t look old and over worn. This is definitely a winner!
customer_reviews.author: R. Mack

customer_reviews.title: Works great but hard to get it flush to the fabric
customer_reviews.text: The thickness of the plastic ring around the shaving head makes it difficult to get close contact with fabric. This probably isn't a problem with thicker/fluffier materials, like sweaters and blankets, but when shaving the thinner, smoother fabric of a hoodie (as I was doing), the process a bit tedious. I had to hold the fabric in my other hand and push it onto the surface of the shaver to get a clean, close shave. But in doing it that way, it did do a fantastic job of de-balling my hoodies. For less than the cost of one new hoodie, I've already brought 3 back to life again!
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: I CAN'T WAIT TO SHAVE MY SWEATERS!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the coolest invention EVER!!! After revamping my ottomans, I attacked my pilled clothing with gusto. The pictures show the ottoman at it's worst and renewed, including the inside. Easy to use. Easy to clean. Reviews are accurate and confirm an affordable, fantastic working product.
customer_reviews.author: lil stormster

customer_reviews.title: My sweaters look brand new!!
customer_reviews.text: I knew I needed a sweater shaver but haven’t had good luck with them in the past. My mom got this one and loves it, so I decided to try it too. I expected to use this on select spots of sweaters that get pile easily, but it made my sweater look brand new in those spots I had to do the whole sweater! My favorite cashmere sweater hasn’t looked this good in a long time! Told a co-worker and she got one too! Pic shows the immediate difference!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Shave!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great fabric shaver. For those that have sensitive fabrics, there is an included guard so you can’t shave that close, for all other fabrics, it gets really close. The lint catcher is large and allows you to de-pill an entire sweater without needing to be emptied. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: M.A.

customer_reviews.title: Works ok, not great.
customer_reviews.text: It works, but not great. Eats batteries and I had to go over the same spot like 100x. You can see that the canister fills, but I think I need a bigger/stronger one for couch cushions. It just doesn't seem to get them all. I think I may return.
customer_reviews.author: Sheilajvp

customer_reviews.title: but I really found out how bad it was when I got this little gem
customer_reviews.text: I knew my old shaver was past it, but I really found out how bad it was when I got this little gem. I used it without the spacer on a man's cable knit sweater that was covered in pills and fluff. It looks great! I had to dump the lint container 4 times and it's a spacious container. It removed the fluff and pills quickly and cleanly. If you save just one valuable garment this pays for itself.
customer_reviews.author: at home in the Poconos

customer_reviews.title: Overall Good. While mine did not last long, you have 2 year warranty.
customer_reviews.text: After a few uses throughout the 2018-9 winter, I begin to see battery rusts. Now it stops working. However, the customer service was so responsive and promised that they will send me a replacement. In the near future, I will update after using this replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Meh so far
customer_reviews.text: I used this once and it was laborious. Not going to give a poor rating because I have only tried using it on one sweater. Maybe the sweater wasn't an easy match for the lint remover. It had a ton of positive reviews. Therefore I had high expectations that it would easily remove pilling with little to no effort. I will update the review once I've tried it out more. But this was a product I was on the cusp of returning.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen and Susan

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I am using it wrong, but this shaver DOES NOT WORK. I tried with the guard on and with the guard off. It didn’t make any of the several different types of garments I tried it on look any different. I tried on multiple types of surfaces too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Couch saver!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical of this product at first but all the other reviews were correct. This product is amazing and simple to use. Our couch always gets fuzzies attaches to it which I would use a razor to try and remove. It was a slow process that left me frustrated at the end. This fabric shaver is the answer to my frustrations! You will be amazed at the amount of lint it shaved off your items.
customer_reviews.author: Molly P

customer_reviews.title: Nice price, works as advertised, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to use and does what it is supposed to do. I used it today to clean up an expensive chair the cat had clawed, and also to de-pill some wool sweaters. It worked quickly and effectively. One very minor design flaw, when you turn it on, the motion of your hand easily knocks the lint receptacle loose, but it isn’t a big deal. I would recommend the device without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: James G Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly as promised, close shave with no unexpected fabric damage.
customer_reviews.text: We had a cream colored couch that we were about to toss even after washing all the cushion covers — all the little pills were gathering dirt/lint and the couch was almost embarrassing. We grabbed this fabric shaver device based on the reviews and wow, did it live up to expectations. There are different shaving length options with an optional plastic piece but we didn’t need to use it so we could get the closest shave possible. I have used a different one of these devices in the past but this one worked way better, and now we can use our couch for a bit longer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: even with patience it was pretty impossible to see results
customer_reviews.text: The first setting did not work, so the only setting possible to use was the highest setting. It did not remove fuzz from clothing, even with patience it was pretty impossible to see results.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Estrada

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Where has this been....
customer_reviews.text: I did not know this was an actual thing, but it works! I was looking for a lint remover and stumbled upon this item. Then I saw how it trimmed away at fabrics and upholstery, then I looked at my couch.... then I knew I needed this item. My couch was "growing" fabrics and trimming it made it look pretty good!! Works as advertised, wished it was twice as big tho... a couch takes forever with this.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This little gadget is awesome! I bought this initially because I was selling some high end fashion clothing and there was a little bit of pulling, and it got rid of it so easily! I now use this on my own clothes too! It’s fast simple and easy and nice to offer two speed settings and extra blades! I nice little gadget that people rarely think to get that can help improve the look of their worn clothing
customer_reviews.author: Julia R

customer_reviews.title: Really impressed!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just received the product today and I’m using it for the first time so I don’t know how it will be months from now but I love it so far! I’m very impressed. I posted a before and after picture. It really freshens up your fabric! I have been wondering how to get the pilling off of these pillows for such a long time and this worked fantastically! I totally recommend it. It’s easy to use and comes with everything you need! Totally worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amy W

customer_reviews.title: Really impressed
customer_reviews.text: I very rarely put reviews up but this is legit so good and for the price, thought it was worth it. My couch was pilling so much, it looked terrible. Put this to the test, and five minutes later looked like a new couch. ..I sound like a commercial 🙄 but seriously.. was so satisfying to do also! I included a pic of one side of my couch down, and the other side waiting for its turn! Both sides looked equally terrible so you can see the difference!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: BEAUTURAL Fabric Shaver and Lint Remover, Sweater Defuzzer with 2-Speeds, 2 Replaceable Stainless Steel Blades, Battery Operated (Grey)
feature_bullets: EASILY REMOVE LINT BALLS, PILLS AND FUZZ - suitable all types of garments and fabrics, including sweaters, jerseys, blankets, bed sheets, upholstery, couch and much more. (NOT REMOVE PET HAIRS)

DURABLE AND EFFICIENT - sharp and durable blades that last for years and are easily replaceable(2 extra blades included), the expanded blade surface covers a larger area, finishing the job quickly with less effort.
HIGHLY ADJUSTABLE - 3 shave heights, 2 speeds and 3 shaving head hole sizes for suiting all different types of fabric and lint-ball sizes.
DUAL PROTECTION - the honeycomb shaver foil ensures your fabrics aren’t cut or snagged, the blades SAFTY LOCK mechanism ensures it’s Safe for cleaning or touched by your children accidentally.
WE CARE ABOUT YOUR EXPERIENCE - Our California based office ensures a quick response to your problems.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
